string.value: The Little Prince that Loves Roses

There was a strange boy in the middle of the Nihal Desert. Dressed differently from everyone else, with blonde hair that matched the color of the sand... Maybe you should head to #b#m260010500##k and see if he's all right.

The strange boy seemed concerned about his wilting rose. A rose? Who cares about a rose? You're more worried by the fact he's sitting in the middle of the desert. Maybe you should just get him some #b#t2022155#s#k for his roses. Maybe you'll be able to talk some sense into him after that. \n\n#i2022155# #t2022155# #b#c2022155##k/5
You gave the strange boy some #t2022155#s. He smiled in relief. Who is this kid anyway? What's he doing here?
사막은... 왜 이렇게 넓은 걸까요. 너무 넓어서 오히려 아무것도 보이지 않는 것 같아요... \r\n#L0# #b 왜 이런 곳에 있는 거니? 목 마르지 않니?
목... 그러고 보니 아까부터 장미꽃이 시들어가고 있어요. 사막의 태양이 이 아이에게는 너무 뜨거운 모양이에요. 괜찮으시다면 장미꽃을 위해 #t2022155#을 구해 주시겠어요?
Why is the desert so big. It's so big that I can't see a thing... \r\n#L0# #b What are you doing here? Aren't you thirsty?
Come to think of it, this rose has been dying for a while. The desert heat must be too much for her. Can you get some #t2022155# for this little rose?
Wow... Thank you. I think #b5 #t2022155#s#k should be enough for the rose. It's such a small little thing.
Why is there no pond in the desert?
Wow… You brought some #t2022155#... You must like flowers, too. \r\n#L0# #b (I'm not worried about flowers. I'm worried about you...)
With this, I am sure the rose will not be mad anymore. It's been cranky at me for a while since it's been so thirsty. Thank you so much for your help...
She's the prettiest, nicest rose you'll find in this world.
I don't think you've gotten #b5 #t2022155#s#k yet. I'm sorry, but she's quite selfish, and she demands more and more.
